name: Outland Amalgamate
description:
In the distant future the Outland Amalgamate has grown rich by terraforming and colonising new worlds.  They protect their investment with their military arm, the Outland Rangers.  Their soldiers are recruited as children from the poorest slums, and put through a gruelling training regime.

You are one of those soldiers. Brought from your family when you were very young, you have little memory of them.  You have almost finished your training, and you and your comrades are about to be assigned to your first unit.  

However you have just discovered there is one final test…

What is it?

This is a short demo of Science Fiction Themed Role Playing Game.

How to play:

Simply point and click with the mouse to move your character.

If you hover the mouse over other characters or objects, the cursor will indicate what you can do:

  • Speech Bubble:  You can talk to them
  • Crosshairs: You can attack them
  • Bag: Something you can pick up
  • Button:  Something you can use

The Spacebar will pause and resume the game.

A full description of the game controls are in the Player Guide.
